thread.title: Big Lots: 20% Off Purchase (This Weekend Only) + Possible 90% Off Christmas Clearance Deals
thread.title_full: Big Lots: 20% Off Purchase (This Weekend Only) + Possible 90% Off Christmas Clearance Deals

author: Mary (Stellar Sidekick)
title: Big Lots: 20% Off Purchase (This Weekend Only) + Possible 90% Off Christmas Clearance Deals
text:
Big Lots shoppers! Tomorrow, January 21st, Big Lots will be offering 20% off your entire purchase for all Buzz Club Rewards members (all you need is your BuzzClub Rewards Card to get the discount). If you’re not a Buzz Club Rewards member yet, then just go here and register for FREE or register at your local store.

Or if you’d rather wait until Sunday, January 22nd, everyone can print a 20% off entire purchase coupon found here (excludes milk, dairy products, eggs, and gift cards). These coupons are bound to make for some sweet deals, so be sure to come back and share what goodies you snatch up!
AND, check out this email from reader Ginger… 
I just wanted to share this crazy shopping trip I just had at Big Lots here in Mentor, Ohio. I got $711.45 worth of Christmas stuff for only $79.05. Everything was 90% off! Crazy huh? 
(Thanks, Ginger & Freebie Shark !)
